posts.post_content:
Shipping will be a flat $2 for any size purchase (within the U.S.).  Paypal f/f preferred.  Regular paypal plus 4% also fine.

Individually prices are nicely discounted and firm. Group discounts will be considered.

All cards have clean Recruit backs.  They are factory 240 backs unless noted.
